bug_report.title: "Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user"
bug_report.Description: "Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application"
bug_report.Steps_to_Reproduce: [ "1. Login into the Application", "2. Navigate to the Users Menu - New User", "3. Filled out all the user information fields", "4. Clicked on the 'Save' button", "5. Seen an error page 'ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Errorâ€¦", "6. See the attached logs for more information" "7. Also see the attached screenshot of the error page" ]
bug_report.Expected_Result: "On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message 'New User has been created successfully'"
bug_report.Actual_Result: "Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user"
